AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck involved in a traffic stop on Farm-to-Market Road 2050, driven by IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR., and suspected of being part of a smuggling operation with RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s white Malibu sedan, impounded by Officer Reymundo Reyes due to lack of proof of insurance
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo B: Agent who arrived at the scene of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s traffic stop and had a conversation with him en route to the Border Patrol station
Defendant who received a citation and was involved in a traffic stop on Farm-to-Market Road 2050, and testified about his conversation with United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo Benavides
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo B: Individuals involved in a conversation en route to the Border Patrol station, where United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo Benavides allegedly used bad language and made threatening statements to IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
